channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- TRIRIGA Application Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- TRIRIGA Application Platform

item.title: CVE-2020-4277|2024-09-17T04:09:25.828Z -- ibm -- tririga%20application%20platform
item.description: IBM TRIRIGA Application Platform 3.5.3 and 3.6.1 discloses sensitive information in error messages that could aid an attacker formulate future attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 175993.

item.title: CVE-2019-4208|2024-09-17T02:31:18.798Z -- ibm -- tririga%20application%20platform
item.description: IBM TRIRIGA Application Platform 3.5.3 and 3.6.0 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 159129.
